summary: Implements a processing stage of the SwiftFormer architecture that sequentially applies multiple convolutional encoder blocks followed by a transformer‑style encoder block to an input feature map, preserving its batch, channel, height, and width dimensions.
business_intent: Provides a reusable building block for constructing SwiftFormer‑based vision models used in image classification, detection, or segmentation pipelines, enabling efficient feature extraction with combined convolutional and attention mechanisms.
